ENGLISH: Hello User, you have selected to play on the Political Rework branch. This branch is for testing purposes only, if you were intending to have a normal run please switch over the the Dev branch instead. Feel free to play around with the mechanic and let me know if you have any suggestions or bug reports on the TGC Discord. -GeneralVonGelre
